### Manual Commands (for non-CodeRabbit comments)

| Command | Description |
|---------|-------------|
| `@claude fix this` | Ask Claude to fix a specific issue |
| `@coderabbitai review` | Request a fresh CodeRabbit review |
| `@coderabbitai summary` | Generate a PR summary |
